name: FutureNow Art Lottery ~ June 2021
description: FutureNow Art Lottery ~ June 2021 DESCRIPTION Enter this awesome Art Lottery and stand a chance to win 30 x original FutureNow Artworks that you can mint on your HIC ET NUNC account + you get to keep ALL of the royalties when you sell them. The winner will receive a portfolio link from us showcasing 60 original artworks by our in-house design team. You will then have the opportunity to curate & select 30 pieces that you can add to your H=N gallery. There are only 100 Lottery Tickets, which can be re-sold as well if they all sell out. So grab them quick! The winner will be announced on the 15th of June 2021 ~ Watch our Twitter @FuturenowArt to see if you've won the GRAND LOTTERY PRIZE.
